snippet: The F.T.C. said that from 2012 to 2014, LifeLock failed to alert customers as soon as their identities were used by thieves and also failed to protect data with the same high-level safeguards used by financial institutions.
abstract: The F.T.C. said that from 2012 to 2014, LifeLock failed to alert customers as soon as their identities were used by thieves and also failed to protect data with the same high-level safeguards used by financial institutions.

headline.main: F.T.C. Accuses LifeLock of Violating Settlement
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Lifelock Is Violating Agreement, F.T.C. Says
